## Pull Request Description

Please provide a clear and concise description of the changes in this PR.

### Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other: ______

### Checklist
- [ ] I have run all tests (e.g., `npm test`) and they pass
- [ ] I have performed a self-review and followed coding standards
- [ ] I have commented my code and updated documentation where necessary
- [ ] I have added tests to cover my changes
- [ ] I have updated dependencies if needed
- [ ] My changes follow the project's guidelines and style
